languages.text: "Да? А какой дурень молился, что б нас грамоте учили? Лучше б башмаков новых попросил или рационов на халяву".
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or some rations."
languages.original_text: "Да? А какой дурень молился, что б нас грамоте учили? Лучше б башмаков новых попросил или рационов на халяву".

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or a handful of nutribars."
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or a handful of nutribars."
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or a handful of nutribars."
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or a handful of nutribars."
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or a handful of nutribars."
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or a handful of nutribars."
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or some rations."
"Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or a handful of nutribars."

languages.text: « Ah ouais ? Faut quand même être sacrément stupide pour demander à ce qu'on nous enseigne les lettres plutôt que de réclamer des nouvelles chaussures ou quelques rations. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or some rations."

traits.locale_text: « Ah ouais ? Faut quand même être sacrément stupide pour demander à ce qu'on nous enseigne les lettres plutôt que de réclamer des nouvelles chaussures ou quelques rations. »
« Ah ouais ? Faut quand même être sacrément stupide pour demander à ce qu'on nous enseigne les lettres plutôt que de réclamer des nouvelles chaussures ou une poignée de nutribarres. »

languages.text: «¿Ah, sí? ¿Y a qué imbécil se le ha ocurrido rezar para que nos enseñen a leer? ¡Porque podía haber pedido calzado nuevo o más raciones!».
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or some rations."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ah, sí? ¿Y a qué imbécil se le ha ocurrido rezar para que nos enseñen a leer? ¡Porque podía haber pedido calzado nuevo o más raciones!».
«¿Ah, sí? ¿Y a qué imbécil se le ha ocurrido rezar para que nos enseñen a leer? ¡Porque podía haber pedido calzado nuevo o barritas de nutrientes!».

languages.text: 「へぇ？俺達に文字を学んで欲しいなんて、どんなノータリンだ？新しい靴か配給が欲しいもんだな」
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or some rations."

traits.locale_text: 「へぇ？俺達に文字を学んで欲しいなんて、どんなノータリンだ？新しい靴か配給が欲しいもんだな」
「へぇ？俺達に文字を学んで欲しいなんて、どんなノータリンだ？新しい靴か片手いっぱいの栄養バーが欲しいもんだな」

languages.text: “噢，是吗？到底是哪个蠢货祈祷有人来教我们读书写字？那个人真该祈祷发双新鞋，或者发些口粮之类的。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or some rations."

traits.locale_text: “噢，是吗？到底是哪个蠢货祈祷有人来教我们读书写字？那个人真该祈祷发双新鞋，或者发些口粮之类的。”
“噢，是吗？到底是哪个蠢货祈祷有人来教我们读书写字？那个人真该祈祷发双新鞋，或者发一把营养条之类的。”

languages.text: "Ach ja? Welcher Narr hat dafür gebetet, dass man uns Buchstaben beibringt? Um neue Schuhe oder ein paar Rationen hätte er bitten sollen."
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah? What kind of fool prayed for us to be taught letters? Should have asked for new shoes or some rations."

traits.locale_text: "Ach ja? Welcher Narr hat dafür gebetet, dass man uns Buchstaben beibringt? Um neue Schuhe oder ein paar Rationen hätte er bitten sollen."
"Ach ja? Welcher Narr hat dafür gebetet, dass man uns Buchstaben beibringt? Um neue Schuhe oder eine Handvoll Nutririegel hätte er bitten sollen."
